author: Guido Lindner and Rudi Studer
title: AST: Support for Algorithm Selection with a CBR Approach
window: the MLT project with its Consultant system [Consortium, 1993] as well as the Statlog project [Michie et al., 1994]), aiming at comparing the performance of a fixed set of algorithms on several data sets. In the Statlog project 23 algorithms were evaluated on 21 data sets. A similar perspective on model selection can be found in [Kohavi et al., 1997], where these ideas form the background
